meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dotty.
meanings.sent1: Her dottinesses made her a lovable character in the story.
meanings.sent2: The dottinesses of the old man added charm to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Despite her dottinesses, she always remembered everyone's birthdays.
meanings.sent4: The dottinesses of the professor were like colorful dots in a gray world.
meanings.sent5: The dottinesses of the clown made the children laugh uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: The eccentric or scatterbrained behavior associated with being dotty.
meanings.sent1: His dottinesses often led to amusing misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The dottinesses of the artist inspired unique and quirky creations.
meanings.sent3: Despite his dottinesses, he always managed to surprise us with his talent.
meanings.sent4: Her dottinesses were like a whirlwind of creativity in the office.
meanings.sent5: The dottinesses of the inventor brought about revolutionary ideas.
